messages.title: The Lib Dem Difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are winning here. With their powerful local campaigns, they have stopped the Tesco development, saved St. Martins School and even got Fly-tipping fines doubled. The Lib Dems can win here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems would put money back in your pocket with fair taxes. They plan to raise the tax threshold to £10,000, which will save most taxpayers £700 a year and help 4 million low earners.
Liberal Democrats pledge a squeeze on wasteful spending and a clampdown on NHS bureaucracy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats are winning here with their powerful local campaigns.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems would save most taxpayers £700 a year by raising the tax threshold to £10,000.
issues.governance: Stopped the Tesco development, saved St. Martins School, got Fly-tipping fines doubled.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats plan a squeeze on wasteful spending and a clampdown on NHS bureaucracy.

housing.content: They have stopped the Tesco development.

leaflet.personalStatement: Steve Broadhurst and the Lib Dems work for you all year round, not just at election time.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Steve suspects Gordon Brown doesn't want an election because he knows he would lose his seat.
